title: Welcome Page - Proceed to Main Application

steps.action: Navigate to the welcome page URL: https://dev-amber.dev.clippd.com/welcome
steps.expected: The welcome page loads successfully, displaying a greeting message (e.g., 'Welcome to Clippd!') and a prominent call-to-action button (e.g., 'Get Started' or 'Continue to Dashboard').

steps.action: Click on the primary call-to-action button (e.g., 'Get Started' or 'Continue').
steps.expected: The user is successfully redirected from the welcome page to the main application's dashboard or home page.

verification: The URL changes to the application's dashboard URL (e.g., '/dashboard' or '/home'), and the main dashboard content (e.g., user data, navigation menu, 'Dashboard' title) is visible and correctly loaded.
